ðŸ“– Summary: Manim is a Python framework for creating mathematical animations, primarily used for explanatory videos like those by 3Blue1Brown. The community edition (ManimCE) offers continued development, improved features, and enhanced documentation. It allows users to programmatically generate precise and visually appealing animations of mathematical concepts.
